REGISTRATION.CO_AUTHORS: Co-authors (example: Ivanov I.I., include the main author)

CONTACTS.DEPARTMENT: Department of Hight Mathematic of NTU 'KhPI'

ARTICLE_RULES.TITLE: Rules for publications
ARTICLE_RULES.TEXT: Publications will be published in the journal
ARTICLE_RULES.NAME: Journal of Computational and Applied Mathematics
ARTICLE_RULES.REQUIREMENTS_TITLE: Requirements for the design of an article for its publication in the 'Journal of Computational and Applied Mathematics' (2021), included in the list of peer-reviewed publications of the Ministry of Education and Science of Ukraine)
ARTICLE_RULES.REQUIREMENT_1: Formatting the article in accordance with the template (Template of the article MDOZMFDSMMPh- 2021.doc) - 6 full pages of text (the text of the article, together with titles, with 2 annotations and together with a list of references) + additional (1-2) pages (only with titles and abstracts of articles in 3 languages: English, Ukrainian, Russian and bibliography in English)
ARTICLE_RULES.REQUIREMENT_2: Making an article in the form of 2 named files: Author1-Author2-Title.doc and Author1-Author2-Title.pdf
ARTICLE_RULES.REQUIREMENT_3: Compliance of the article with the subject matter of the MDOZMF-2021 symposium
ARTICLE_RULES.REQUIREMENT_4: Passing peer review in the editorial board of the 'Journal of Numerical and Applied Mathematics'
ARTICLE_RULES.EMAIL_TEXT: Articles in the form of files are sent to the email address
